fpmExplorer:Page.title: Radio Button Group
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The Field building block enables you to render fields with a fixed value list as radio button groups.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Step 1: Define a fixed value list
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: Add Commmon.ValueList and Common.ValueListWithFixedValues annotations to the property for which you want to show a radio button group in edit mode. Inside Common.ValueList, also add a Parameters entry of type Common.ValueLIstParameterInOut connecting the local property with the ValueList property.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.title: Step 2: Add format options to the field
fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: For the field building block, add a formatOptions element with a fieldEditStyle attribute and the value RadioButtons.
